data_variables.name: df
data_variables.description: DataFrame that is expected to be created and used throughout the analysis but is not explicitly defined in the visible code.

data_variables.name: nHistogramShown
data_variables.description: An integer parameter for specifying how many histograms to plot.

data_variables.name: nHistogramPerRow
data_variables.description: An integer parameter for specifying the number of histograms shown per row.

data_variables.name: graphWidth
data_variables.description: An integer used for determining the width of the correlation matrix plot.

data_variables.name: plotSize
data_variables.description: An integer that defines the size of the scatter matrix plots.

data_variables.name: textSize
data_variables.description: An integer that sets the text size for annotations in scatter plots.

data_flow.creation: Assumed to be loaded from an unspecified DataFrame; exact source or creation method not mentioned.
Defined as a parameter in the histogram plotting function.
data_flow.flow: Used in the plotHistogram function to limit the number of histograms displayed.

data_flow.creation: Defined as a parameter in the histogram plotting function.
data_flow.flow: Used in the plotHistogram function to configure how many histograms appear per row.

data_flow.creation: Defined as a parameter in the correlation matrix plotting function.
data_flow.flow: Used in the plotCorrelationMatrix function to set the size of the plot.

data_flow.creation: Defined as a parameter in the scatter matrix plotting function.
